00029 using namespace std;
00030 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;

00032 #define TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE_WITH_GRIDS "../data/test.file.data_dat_with_grid"
00033 
00034 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetTest_MultipleSets );
00035 
00036 DataSetTest_MultipleSets::DataSetTest_MultipleSets()
00037 {
00038         data = 0;
00039         dataPlane = 0;
00040 }
00041 
00042 DataSetTest_MultipleSets::~DataSetTest_MultipleSets()
00043 {
00044 
00045 }
00046 
00047 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::setUp()
00048 {
00049         // Open one DataSet.
00050         data = new GenericData;
00051         GenericFileReader reader;
00052         std::string name = TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE_WITH_GRIDS;
00053         reader.SetFilename(name);
00054         reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00055         try
00056         {
00057                 dataPlane = data->DataSet(0,0); // acquired data is the first DataSet of the first DataGroup.
00058         }
00059         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException&)
00060         {
00061                 dataPlane = 0;
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::tearDown()
00066 {
00067         if (dataPlane)
00068                 dataPlane->Delete();
00069         delete data;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::testCreation()
00073 {
00074         // Check that the DataSet was created.
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00076 }
00077 
00078 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::testCreateSecondDataSet()
00079 {
00080         DataSet* gridDP=NULL;
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP = data->DataSet(L"",L"grid position"));
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->Delete());
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::testOpenTwoDataSets()
00087 {
00088         DataSet* gridDP=NULL;
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP = data->DataSet(L"",L"grid position"));
00090 
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gridDP->Open() == true);
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->Delete());      // also calls Close
00095 }
00096 
00097 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::testAccessDataFromTwoDifferentDataSets()
00098 {
00099         // Create second DataSet
00100         DataSet* gridDP=NULL;
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP = data->DataSet(L"",L"grid position"));
00102 
00103         // Open both DataSets
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gridDP->Open() == true);
00106 
00107         // Access the data from both DataSets
00108 
00109         // Access from the grid DataSet
00110         int32_t rows = gridDP->Rows();
00111         int32_t cols = gridDP->Cols();
00112         for (int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row)
00113         {
00114                 for (int32_t col = 0; col < cols; ++col)
00115                 {
00116                         // Compute the expected value
00117                         float expected = (float)(row*100 + col/2); // corner = col/2
00118 
00119                         float value;
00120                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->GetData(row, col, value));
00121                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00122                 }
00123         }
00124 
00125         // Access the acquired data DataSet
00126         rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00127         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00128         {
00129                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00130                 u_int16_t value;
00131                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00132                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00133         }
00134 
00135         // Access the grid DataSet again.
00136         rows = gridDP->Rows();
00137         cols = gridDP->Cols();
00138         for (int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row)
00139         {
00140                 for (int32_t col = 0; col < cols; ++col)
00141                 {
00142                         // Compute the expected value
00143                         float expected = (float)(row*100 + col/2); // corner = col/2
00144 
00145                         float value;
00146                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->GetData(row, col, value));
00147                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00148                 }
00149         }
00150 
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->Delete());      // also calls Close
00153 }
00154 
00155 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::testAccessDataFromTwoInstancesOfSamePlane()
00156 {
00157         // Create second instance of the acquired data DataSet
00158         DataSet* gridDP=NULL;
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP = data->DataSet(L"",L"acquired data"));
00160 
00161         // Open both DataSets
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gridDP->Open() == true);
00164 
00165         // Access the first instance DataSet
00166         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00167         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00168         {
00169                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00170                 u_int16_t value;
00171                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00172                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00173         }
00174 
00175         // Access the second instance of the acquired data DataSet
00176         rows = gridDP->Rows();
00177         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00178         {
00179                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00180                 u_int16_t value;
00181                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->GetData(row, 0, value));
00182                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00183         }
00184 
00185         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00186         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->Delete());      // also calls Close
00187 }
